response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am offering the product to you at a special price of $12,000, which I hope is a reasonable compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 12000}
